email_body: remind jim how the h/j/k spread acted this year. granted it won't behave that way again until close to expiry, but i like the j/k outright much moreso than the condor. Caroline Abramo@ENRON 04/30/2001 12:24 PM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: pulaski ---------------------- Forwarded by Caroline Abramo/Corp/Enron on 04/30/2001 01:23 PM --------------------------- Jim Pulaski <Jim.Pulaski@tudor.com> on 04/30/2001 12:17:09 PM To: "Caroline. Abramo (E-mail)" <Caroline.Abramo@enron.com> cc: Subject: btw, that wasnt me buying the f-g/j-k on friday at 4
